product_overview: Zwa Marketplace is a robust B2B e-commerce platform that connects buyers, sellers, and affiliates, facilitating product discovery, negotiation, order management, and affiliate marketing with a seamless user experience across roles.
core_goals: Enable efficient product discovery and filtering for buyers.
Provide a real-time chat and negotiation system between buyers and sellers.
Support comprehensive product management with images, MOQ, and commission settings for sellers.
Implement secure order processing with OTP verification and status tracking.
Facilitate affiliate marketing with unique tracking links and commission management.
Offer user role-specific dashboards to monitor key metrics and manage activities.
key_features: Multi-role authentication system supporting buyers, sellers, affiliates, and admin roles using Supabase Auth.
Product catalog with real-time search, filtering by price and categories, and detailed product pages with images, MOQ, and commission info.
Real-time chat system enabling message exchange, offer creation, and acceptance during negotiation.
Order management system including cart validation against MOQ, order payment summary, and status tracking with OTP delivery confirmation.
Seller dashboard for product CRUD, boutique customization, order processing, commission and withdrawal requests.
Affiliate dashboard for link generation, tracking clicks and conversions, commission management, and VIP partnership requests.
Rating and review system for buyers to submit feedback upon order delivery.
user_flow_summary: Buyer browses marketplace homepage, searches for products, filters results, and views product details.
Buyer initiates chat with seller, negotiates price and quantity, receives offers, and accepts negotiated deals which add items to cart.
Buyer manages cart with MOQ validation, proceeds to order payment page, and tracks order status including OTP confirmation on delivery.
Seller manages product listings by adding, editing, and publishing products with details and images.
Seller processes orders by viewing details, marking orders as shipped with OTP generation, and confirming delivery with OTP input to release funds.
Affiliate generates promotional referral links, shares them, and tracks clicks, conversions, and commissions via dashboard.
Cross-role integration ensures commissions are correctly allocated after order completion and payment release with OTP validation.
validation_criteria: Authentication works correctly for all user roles with role-specific access control.
Search and filtering accurately display correct product subsets in real-time.
Chat system reliably sends and receives messages and supports offer creation and acceptance flows.
Product CRUD operations validate required fields and image uploads, and updates reflect instantly in product listings.
Order processing enforces MOQ rules, disables ordering below MOQ unless a negotiated offer exists.
OTP codes are generated, sent, and verified accurately impacting order status transitions and fund releases.
Affiliate referral tracking persists in sessionStorage and commissions update according to order statuses.
Dashboards display accurate metrics such as sales, orders, commissions, and provide working withdrawal request functionality.
User reviews are submitted and displayed correctly, updating product rating averages.
Critical integrations between buyer, seller, and affiliate flows complete successfully end-to-end with data consistency.
